page.title: 03Education Around World's End
page.content: This area does not contain a school for over sevens. People living here send their children to a school in Newbury, which is about 5 miles away, or Chieveley (1 mile away) which is nearer to get to from the area. The area does however contain a nursery school for infants. This is located in the village hall at World's End. The people say that when their children are 14, they will send them to a senior school at Compton, about 3 miles away which is quite far to go. A landowner said that they would have to build a senior nearer to them. The education is good but there should be more teachers because the population is increasing.
